title: Russia begins blocking messenger Telegram
text:
Russia begins blocking messenger Telegram Monday, April 16, 2018 - 01:03 
Russia's state telecommunications regulator has begun blocking access to messenger service Telegram after the firm's owner refused to allow Russian state security assess to users' encrypted messages. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Russia's state telecommunications regulator has begun blocking access to messenger service Telegram after the firm's owner refused to allow Russian state security assess to users' encrypted messages. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2IYrJMj
